item.title: Essentials of data.table
item.description: Motivation data.table is a R package that offers an enhanced version of data.frame and allows very fast data manupulation. As data.table is data.frame too, all functions and operations that apply to data.frame also applies to data.table. However, there are many enhancements that are only available in data.table, and unavailable in data.frame. I used to be an avid user of tidyverse since I had started working with R. But recently, I started working with very large dataframes (few million obs.

item.title: Inspecting Konkor 1397 (2018) Data
item.description: Read about the Konkor exam in Afghanistan in the footnote.1 Disclaimer: Konkor data is not public, but Konkor results dataset was publicly shared by various individuals on social media on August 1, 2018. As the dataset include personal information, I will aggregate the results at provincial level without using personal information such as names. The data has the following variables or indicators: Variables Description name Name of test taker gender Gender of test taker gradyear Year graduated from high school score Konkor test score province Name of Province cheat Whether test taker was caught cheating fail Whether test taker failed or admitted to university pvt_univ Whether test taker graduated from a private university univ_prov Not admitted but eligible for Private Universities Participation Overall, approximately 159 thousand high school graduates took part in the konkor exam of 1397, from all provinces.

item.title: Week 3: Data Manipulation with dplyr
item.description: About tidyverse Pipe Operator About dplyr Select Slice Filter Mutate About tidyverse There are thousands of packages developed by equally large number of developers that provide new features or improve Râ€™s features. One of the most influential and useful set of packages is tidyverse which is a collection of other packages for data manipulation, exploration and visualization. All tidyverse packages share an underlying design philosophy, grammar, and data structures.

item.title: Week 2: On Data Frames and Intro to ggplot2 For Making Graphs
item.description: Data Frames Data Frame Index Create New Column/Variable Inspect Data Frames Basic Graphs with ggplot2 Components of ggplot2 Graphs Types of Plots With ggplot2 Apply a Different Theme Data Frames Data frames are the most widely used data object in R.
